name: choco-apikey
description: Runs Chocolatey ApiKey with specified parameters
author: gep13

inputs.name: source
inputs.label: Source
inputs.helpMarkDown: The source that is associated with the ApiKey.

inputs.name: apikey
inputs.label: ApiKey
inputs.helpMarkDown: The ApiKey that should be used when pushing to the source.

inputs.name: verbose
inputs.label: Show verbose messaging.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Very verbose messaging, avoid using under normal circumstances.

inputs.name: trace
inputs.label: Show trace messaging.
inputs.helpMarkDown: Very, very verbose trace messaging. Avoid except when needing super low-level .NET Framework debugging.
